segments.text: Hey Sarah . Why are you limping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . Hi Matt . I went snowboarding yesterday and my whole body aches .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . And I never want to go again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I remember the first time I went . My back was sore , I couldn't sit down because it hurt my butt , and my legs would cramp if I walked too fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's exactly how I feel now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's only like that the first couple of times .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha . There won't be a next time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You gotta give it a chance . It's fun after awhile .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll think about it after I start feeling better . Right now , I don't even want to hear the word snowboarding .
segments.speaker: S2
